grupal.description: After the resounding success of Group 2025, we're back with everything. From the 7th to the 20th - All 4 Disney World parks + all 4 Universal parks: Studios, Islands of Adventure, Epic Universe and Volcano Bay. 8 parks, 14 days, 1 community. Live the experience thousands have already lived.

app.title: The peace of having it
app.description: Our exclusive technology is what sets your trip apart. Forget the paperwork: day-by-day itineraries, offline digital documents, smart logistics and direct support with your expert agent.

app.featTrazaDigitalDesc: Your trip on the map, day by day.

ceo.credVistasDesc: The most viral agency in the Spanish-speaking market
ceo.quote: Every family that trusts us receives the same dedication I would give to my own. That is my promise, my mission and the reason we created Global Dream Travel.

legales.terminosIntro: Welcome to Global Dream Travel(R) (the Agency). By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions.
legales.sec1Text: Global Dream Travel(R) is an IATA-accredited travel agency offering family, group and corporate travel planning services. We work with international suppliers to guarantee the best experience.
legales.sec2Text: Bookings are confirmed upon receipt of the corresponding deposit according to each supplier's policies. Payments can be made through the methods enabled by the agency.
legales.sec3Text: Cancellation policies vary depending on the supplier and the type of service contracted. Global Dream Travel(R) will inform the specific conditions at the time of booking.
legales.sec4Text: Global Dream Travel(R) acts as an intermediary between the client and tourism service providers. We are not responsible for changes, cancellations or modifications made by third-party suppliers.
legales.privacidadIntro: At Global Dream Travel(R) we are committed to protecting the personal information of our clients and visitors.
legales.datosText: We collect only the data necessary to manage your trip: name, phone, email and travel preferences.
legales.usoText: Your personal information is used exclusively to manage your bookings and provide a personalized experience. We do not sell or share data with unrelated third parties.
legales.contactoText: For inquiries about your personal data, you can contact us through the WhatsApp form or write to our agent email.
